name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf - Saga of the Great Awakening
summary: In the depths of Kanak, the Necrons awakened - the baleful Xenos who are alien to all that is living. Your squad has the honour to be the first to fight them; you are to prove that the name of Valgard Twice-Slain is worthy to be mentioned in the Space Wolves' sagas. For Russ and the Allfather!
